title: Merrick
description: I know him only as Merrick.He watches me.I feel his eyes. They are hard and cold.I hear his voice. It is flat and unemotional.I see his body. It carries the scars of a soldier.He is in charge of the Underground.It doesn’t feel safe here.But returning to the surface means death.My name is Aeryn.I am twenty-two and now a leader of the new world.This is my story…
author: Kate  McCarthy
